Bekele M
, 2013, ‘ The vulnerability of smallholder agriculture to climate variability/Change in Boset Woreda, Oromia Region, Ethiopia’, A Thesis Submitted to The Department of Geography and Environmental Studies Presented in Partial Fulfilment of the Requirements for the Degree of Masters of Arts, Addis Ababa University, Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.
